version_description: Performance and stability improvements. Added landscape orientation for the active task screen, details screen for a completed task, setting to clear saved maps cache.
Performance and stability improvements. Added landscape orientation for the active task screen, details screen for a completed task, setting to clear saved maps cache.
Performance and stability improvements. Added landscape orientation for the active task screen, details screen for a completed task, setting to clear saved maps cache.

Added full support for iPad. iPhone X support. Made tasks load faster with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPad. Added possibility to complete tasks with audio recorder. Other application improvements.

Added full support for iPad. iPhone X support. Made tasks load faster with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPad. Added possibility to complete tasks with audio recorder. Other application improvements.

Added full support for iPad. iPhone X support. Made tasks load faster with iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPad. Added possibility to complete tasks with audio recorder. Other application improvements.

Added a feature to withdraw money and view transactions history directly in the app. Added information about task prices that depend on a user's skill. Other improvements including better app responsiveness, reduced memory and battery consumption.

Added a feature to withdraw money and view transactions history directly in the app. Added information about task prices that depend on a user's skill. Other improvements including better app responsiveness, reduced memory and battery consumption.

Added a feature to withdraw money and view transactions history directly in the app. Added information about task prices that depend on a user's skill. Other improvements including better app responsiveness, reduced memory and battery consumption.
Added a new feature to upload multiple images at once. Other improvements of application performance and stability.
Added a new feature to upload multiple images at once. Other improvements of application performance and stability.
Added a new feature to upload multiple images at once. Other improvements of application performance and stability.
This version fixes GPS coordinates determination issue.
This version fixes GPS coordinates determination issue.
This version fixes GPS coordinates determination issue.
Added a feature to filter tasks by various criteria. Improved app performance for iPhone 4s and iPhone 5. Other fixes and improvements.
Added a feature to filter tasks by various criteria. Improved app performance for iPhone 4s and iPhone 5. Other fixes and improvements.
Added a feature to filter tasks by various criteria. Improved app performance for iPhone 4s and iPhone 5. Other fixes and improvements.

We've added new Support section in the app! In this section you'll be able to access our frequently asked questions (such as how to avoid issues with money withdrawal); structured application help, where you can examine the app feature by feature; report a problem or suggest an improvement!
Also in this version we started to show tasks ratings and worked a lot to improve application reliability.

We've added new Support section in the app! In this section you'll be able to access our frequently asked questions (such as how to avoid issues with money withdrawal); structured application help, where you can examine the app feature by feature; report a problem or suggest an improvement!
Also in this version we started to show tasks ratings and worked a lot to improve application reliability.

We've added new Support section in the app! In this section you'll be able to access our frequently asked questions (such as how to avoid issues with money withdrawal); structured application help, where you can examine the app feature by feature; report a problem or suggest an improvement!
Also in this version we started to show tasks ratings and worked a lot to improve application reliability.
Added the possibility to contact an author of an executed task. Added overview of tasks available on other platforms or by other criteria.
Added the possibility to contact an author of an executed task. Added overview of tasks available on other platforms or by other criteria.

Added the possibility to rate an executed task. Other convenience and reliability improvements.
Added the possibility to rate an executed task. Other convenience and reliability improvements.
Added the possibility to rate an executed task. Other convenience and reliability improvements.

Added a feature showing a route to a place of task execution. Improved messages about money withdrawal status. Added a setting of saving taken photos to Camera Roll album. Added grouping of field tasks on the available tasks screen. Other minor UI improvements.

Added a feature showing a route to a place of task execution. Improved messages about money withdrawal status. Added a setting of saving taken photos to Camera Roll album. Added grouping of field tasks on the available tasks screen. Other minor UI improvements.

Added a feature showing a route to a place of task execution. Improved messages about money withdrawal status. Added a setting of saving taken photos to Camera Roll album. Added grouping of field tasks on the available tasks screen. Other minor UI improvements.

New feature - sending tasks via Wi-Fi - has been added. It saves your Internet traffic when you perform tasks containing photos and audio recordings. You just have to turn on submitting via Wi-Fi in the settings and complete tasks as usual. To send your answers, open the application and connect to Wi-Fi before tasks expiration.

New feature - sending tasks via Wi-Fi - has been added. It saves your Internet traffic when you perform tasks containing photos and audio recordings. You just have to turn on submitting via Wi-Fi in the settings and complete tasks as usual. To send your answers, open the application and connect to Wi-Fi before tasks expiration.

Now you can withdraw money to your phone account (only for Russian numbers of Beeline, MegaFon, MTS, or Tele2).
Open profile for withdrawal history.
The task history is more detailed.
Download your region map and save mobile data.

New section with notifications and messages settings. Enable notifications not to miss important events.
Appearance of pins. Choose the way to display tasks on the map.
Send a complaint. When completing a task, you can send a complaint against a Requester violating the service terms to the support service.
Other interface improvements.

Messages. Communicate with requesters, learn the news of the service, get notifications about withdrawal and new skills.
3D-mode on the map. Enter the 3D-mode to drop a pin at the company's entrance.
Device memory usage optimization. The application data needs less space now.

Add tasks to favourites or hide them. You can place your favourite tasks at the top sorting it by "favourites first".
Hide tasks you're not interested in. If you change your mind turn on the filter "Hidden" to show a task again.

Choose what to do with tasks when you exit them. Reject tasks or reserve them to complete later.
Go to the "Referral program" tab to learn about your bonuses and to invite friends.

Offline mode tasks completion. Your assignment will be submitted automatically when you are online.
Sort skills. Choose the order in which your skills are shown: by the update date, from highest to lowest or alphabetically.

New types of notifications. Enable notifications about important events in "More - Notifications settings".
Cancel your withdrawal requests. If you need to change the amount of money or your payment system, just cancel the withdrawal request and create a new one.
Profile info. Please use your real first and last name - when you withdraw money, we check who will receive the funds.
Floor plan. Select a floor on the shopping mall map to see what's there.
